322  enum profile
323  {
324  PROFILE_ES20,
325  PROFILE_ES30,
326  PROFILE_GL32,
327  PROFILE_GL33,
328  PROFILE_KTX
329  };
330 
331  typedef glm::tvec4<int> swizzles;
332 
333  struct format
334  {
335  internal_format Internal;
336  external_format External;
337  type_format Type;
338  swizzles Swizzles;
339  };
340 
341  gl(profile Profile);
342 
344  target const& translate(gli::target Target) const;
345 
347  format translate(gli::format Format, gli::swizzles const& Swizzle) const;
348 
350  gli::format find(internal_format InternalFormat, external_format ExternalFormat, type_format Type);
351 
352  private:
353  struct format_desc
354  {
355  internal_format Internal;
356  external_format External;
357  type_format Type;
358  unsigned int Properties;
359  };
360 
361  bool has_swizzle(profile Profile) const
362  {
363  return Profile == PROFILE_ES30 || Profile == PROFILE_GL33;
364  }
365 
366  gl::swizzles compute_swizzle(format_desc const& FormatDesc, gli::swizzles const& Swizzle) const;
367 
368  std::array<format_desc, FORMAT_COUNT> FormatDesc;
369  profile Profile;
370  };

Texture data format.

Convert GLI targets into OpenGL texture targets.
